# tiltPlot

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tiltPlot is to provide plots for the TILT project. 

## Example

Let us load the toy data set.

```{r}
library(tiltPlot)
```

### 1. Sankey Plot 

```{r}
toy_data
```

```{r eval=interactive()}
plot_sankey(toy_data)
```

### 2. XCTR plot for one company

```{r}
xctr_toy_data
```

```{r}
subset_data <- xctr_toy_data |> 
  filter(company_name == sample(company_name, 1))
plot_xctr_company_level(subset_data, company_name)
```
